title: Mission Description
content: The murmurs near your ears grow louder, more booming. Let's hope you can hold on until the moment you step onto the stage of the amusement park.

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "...According to a Pier Point hotline tip, there was a major breakthrough in the shocking Egyhazo Aventurine case. The suspect has been arrested..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "This fraud case has been linked to many departments within the Interastral Peace Corporation and the Intelligentsia Guild , causing a large drain in manpower and resources, resulting in the IPC taking a massive loss..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "The case's main suspect originates from Sigonia-IV , and is one of the survivors of the Second Katica-Avgin Extinction Event, who does not carry an Interstellar Refugee Travel Permit..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "As per Strategic Investment Department head Diamond 's sentiments, the IPC has appropriately relocated the suspect in the spirit of the Charter , and will continue to conduct further investigations as to the motive of the suspect..."

text: Media:Trailblaze Mission All the Sad Tales 1.mp4

speaker: Jade
line: What pretty eyes. Tell me, do they shine in the dark?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: Well if they did, I'd sell them in a heartbeat.

speaker: Jade
line: You don't know how many people long for your eyes to be closed forever. As a servant, you should not resist your master... Yet you went and killed that man anyway.

speaker: Jade
line: No lawyer has the audacity to defend you, perhaps you ought to represent yourself?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: Not difficult. But definitely pointless.

speaker: Jade
line: You're pretty confident on your eloquence. Did you also think that when you lied to the Intelligentsia Guild?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: Ask and you shall receive. You wanted the perfect construction material — all I did was offer a possibility. It was just a small wager.

speaker: Kakavasha
line: If your luck holds out, the IPC will dig something up from the golden sands of Egyhazo, maybe even the Sand King's remains. Pity, your luck has run out.

speaker: Jade
line: I'll admit that. What I'm more curious about though, is why such a grand scheme failed to benefit anyone in the end, including the perpetrator himself?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: Madam, I already have what I want — to be brought before you, for the next high-stakes gamble.

speaker: Jade
line: Then let's talk about the second gamble. Tell me, what are you prepared to wager this time?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: My life. I bet you won't send me to the gallows.

speaker: Jade
line: Hmm... What do you want then?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: I want your Lanor to meet with me. I have something to say.

speaker: Jade
line: And then what?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: I want cash.

speaker: Jade
line: It can't be that simple, can it?

speaker: Kakavasha
line: It is that simple. Thirty Tanbas — the remainder of my... market value. Thirty Tanbas, no more, no less.

speaker: Kakavasha
line: With this money, I'll climb to even greater heights than you, grasp even more riches than you... I wager you won't give me this chance... which is why you should call him here.

speaker: Jade
line: Interesting.

speaker: Jade
line: A pity Diamond won't see you. No one gets to see him. From here on out, I am Diamond's representative, and I will decide on his behalf.

speaker: Jade
line: You're wrong. Thirty Tanbas... I'll give you that, and much more than that. Wealth, status, power... the IPC will give you whatever you want, even what you don't want.

speaker: Jade
line: Kakavasha... A good name, but unfortunately destined to be buried in the dirt. You though, you deserve to live, to create even more wealth for us.

speaker: Jade
line: Go, pick the clothes you like, then choose your desired identity... and then use them well, child.

speaker: Jade
line: May your schemes be forever concealed.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Life is like a long-term investment. Those who choose correctly, do the correct things, reach the correct outcomes, show the world their value.

speaker: Aventurine
line: People can't always make the right choices in their lives, but luck has always been on my side. I've never lost.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Is it because Gaiathra blesses me? If that's the case, SHE must also be looking upon me right now. My success is inevitable.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...But, what then?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Even if I overcome this difficult trial, what would come next? What awaits me after this glorious gamble... an even more glorious one?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Will I return triumphant with unending riches after countless successes, or will I encounter failure...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...never to return?
I'm pretty sure you already have some ideas...
...Lowly gambler?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Wh—What?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Am I dreaming, or have I gone completely insane?
Perhaps both.
Forgotten me already? When you were strapped to that electric chair by Iymanikan warlords, who was it that gave you the idea?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Fine... I may be crazy, but I'm not stupid. Get out of my head, newborn of the Harmony .
Heh, the Harmony? Don't play the fool — it's not the first time we've met. No need to be so polite.

I'm you, and perhaps even more aware of yourself than you, of what exactly you want. You're dying, and you still want to drag a bunch of unfortunate fools with you through death's door... That's why you're here, isn't it?
...A grand unveiling. You really think you can pull it off?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Why not?
Well you may have fooled everyone, but you can't fool yourself.
I can show you — before you're entirely gone, I'll be with you for the last stretch of your road...
Let's have a heart-to-heart while we walk.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...What exactly are you?
Most people in this world spend their entire lives just to reach one outcome... and I am that outcome.
Kakavasha... I am your future.

text: Head t█ the c█ntr█l stage of the p█rk

title: Step Description
content: The murmurs n██r your ears grow louder, more booming. You can even see another ███ ██████.Let's hope you can hold on until the m█ment you st█p onto the stag█ of the █m█sement pa██.

speaker: Aventurine
line: First I'm hearing things, and now I'm seeing them. Great! Am I going to be elevated into the Harmony's Emanator next?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Why are there no guests here? What's that feather-head doing?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Just a Pepeshi ... No, a child?

title: Step Description
content: You █████ ██ ██ █ ███ discovered a str█ng█ ch█ld — H█ s██ms t█ h██l fr█m th█ Avgin █r█g█ns...W█r█n't th█y █lr██dy w█p█d out?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I thought minors weren't allowed in Golden Hour ... Hey kid, are you okay? Are you lost—

speaker: Aventurine
line: — Ugh!

speaker: Young Child
line: What's wrong, Mister... You don't look well.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Your... eyes?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Impossible. Who are you?

speaker: Young Child
line: They're pretty, aren't they? Sis said they're a gift from Mama Fenge . Colorful eyes are said to bring good luck.

speaker: Young Child
line: Ah, Mister... You have pretty eyes too. Beautiful!

speaker: Aventurine
line: Are... you alone? Where are your parents?

speaker: Young Child
line: They're in that amusement park. Papa and Mama went in first. I'm just about to go look for them.

speaker: Young Child
line: I have to go, goodbye Mister. Hope you have a good time too!

title: Step Description
content: You are c█m█lete██ ██tranc█d by t█e █vgin boy.██ust who ███he? There█s sti█l tim███Mayb█ you ███ catch up ██ h██ and as█ █im exactly wha█ █████████.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Those eyes... and Mama Fenge... No! It can't...

speaker: Aventurine
line: There AREN'T any Avgins left!

speaker: Young Child
line: Papa, Mama, wait for me...
Only on Penacony , am I right?

speaker: Aventurine
line: What are you still doing here?
You've known all along, if The Family truly showed leniency to everyone who came seeking help, why would there be a need for such high walls and deep moats?

However, people don't see it like that, especially since the flavor of the dream syrup is so alluring. You will receive no charity on Penacony, and relying on your own strength alone to topple high walls...? Not a likely feat.

Which is why once you step into the hotel, you remove your high hat and beg everyone you come across for help, like a hyena scavenging for scraps in the desert. Because you know that opportunities are fleeting.

speaker: Aventurine
line: When you put it like that, even Ratio 's "Attini Peacock" analogy sounds pleasant.
You know how rare it is for me to give you the straight dope, so listen while you can.

It's good timing that you mentioned the doctor. I'm especially fond of what you and he have in common, the conspiracies... calculations... especially the part about the finale, a magnificent act of betrayal!
...When everyone thinks this way, who would even suspect that it was another trap you've meticulously devised?
Go on. Tell me I'm right. You know who you really are, Mr. Cavalier Gambler: Uptight, overcautious, massive inferiority complex. You've won so much, and you're still SO afraid of losing.
They only see your big bets, your bravado, the full house, the straight flush. They don't know the other hand is below the table, clutching your chips for dear life.
It's a heck of an act. No wonder the tavern sent you an invite. You're a natural, kid. You don't stop at fooling the audience — you fool yourself too.

speaker: Aventurine
line: The best way to prevent others from seeing your true colors, is first being able to fool yourself.

Haha, of course, I know you all too well... But, it's strange — why did you decline that invitation? You had the chance to embrace Elation . Was that not what you most wanted? But you chose the IPC instead...
For the Preservation ? Hmph, I doubt it. Do you even have anything in common with the Preservation?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I thought you knew... Didn't you say you had me pegged?

speaker: Aventurine
line: We're done. Either stop talking, or disappear from my sight.
That's fine. But, who exactly is about to disappear here?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...It's not going to be me anyway.

text: After the agony in stonier places

speaker: Young Child
line: Ahh, playing hide-and-seek? I'm really good at this!

speaker: Young Child
line: It's my turn to hide now! I bet you guys can't find meeee!
Hide-and-seek... What sweet childhood memories.
When Mama said goodbye that day, how many Katicans were like jackals hot on your heels?

I know you won't forget that sound anytime soon, those shrill cackles? You had to hide right under the noses of those savages, you and Big Sis, playing dead, drifting in all that bloody water. Completely ruined that shirt. Shame. Wasn't that the last one Dad left behind?

speaker: Aventurine
line: It wasn't ruined. I've always kept it.
Come on. It's a rag. It's not like you can ever wear it.
Now you don't have to hide. You probably won't even deign to get your pretty outfit wet in the rain... Your social capital has changed, after all.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...I've never changed.
On the contrary, now you're the one who does the hunting. The last round of hide and seek, and you get to be it. You should enjoy it.

text: W█n th█ Hide█an██S█ek █ame an█ f█nd the A█gin bo█

title: Step Description
content: You are unable to uncover your pastYou are █nable to uncover your pastYou █████nable to uncover your ████You █████nabl█ to unco█er y█ur ████You █████na███ to un███er y█ur ████

speaker: Aventurine
line: That child... Could he be in here?

text: He who was once living is now dead
We who were once lived are now dying

speaker: Aventurine
line: Is this...

speaker: Aventurine
line: A topaz ? What is this doing here...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Uhh...
What, does her cornerstone wrench at your heart so?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...I was merely curious why it was here.
Maybe that winged guy put it here to taunt you. Just to make you realize that your painstakingly arranged magic show is nothing but a death rattle.

"The cornerstone 's hue is the same as the radiance of Qlipoth 's body"... I've got to give it to you, I've heard a lot of baloney, but that lie deserves a prize for sheer nerve. If he were just a little bit smarter, the jig would've been up right there.

speaker: Aventurine
line: This is just bait.
Of course! That's why Ratio's betrayal was one of the keys to your plan. I have to say, that doctor's acting was superb.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Or maybe he wasn't acting at all?
All the better for you!
Sunday didn't become head of the Oak Family by acting sloppy. He's obsessed with control. You have to give him enough detail to satisfy his meticulous nature, but not so much that he gets suspicious.

...Which is why you had Ratio seek him out and leak the plan on purpose — to prevent the other party from suspecting anything. The intel you gave to Ratio was all true, and he spoke the same to Sunday.
Finally, Sunday took the bait , found the other cornerstone, and before you know it...
...Everyone's distracted enough for you to steal the third stone , right out from under them.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Why don't you stop rummaging through my mind.
Your mind? It's our mind. You're me, and I'm you. We're the same.
"The best way to prevent others from seeing your true colors, is to first be able to fool yourself"... Really? You can't even fool yourself. You just got lucky this time.
This is the other cornerstone in Sunday's hands. A rather beautiful green, just like you, smooth and cunning...
Tell me, what's its name?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Why are you even asking me?
Ugh, must I do all the work? Aventurine is the stone of luck and trickery... That's what she said when you received the stone, wasn't it?
This type of stone isn't rare, but its hue is very similar to a certain gem. In fact, it's often used as a substitute . And that more precious gem is...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ... Jade .

speaker: Aventurine
line: Even Sunday can't tell the difference. It looks like jade can be substituted for aventurine, too. Sauce for the goose...
Aventurine, Topaz , Jade ... Three elites , three cornerstones who, for a measly Penacony, offered their everything. You're even more united than The Family.

speaker: Aventurine
line: As I said before, three chips are sufficient — all, or nothing.

speaker: Aventurine
line: But will it be the former, or the latter? Hah, we'll find out soon enough.
So, where's the real aventurine stone? Take it out. Let's have a look.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Heh, suddenly you don't know where it is?
I just want to hear you say it... After all, it really does resemble its owner.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...As you wish then. They never went anywhere. They're right where they belong...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Piled up with these cheap baubles.
You smashed the aventurine stone before you left...?
...Just look at it, tsk. Shattered, just like your life. Poor thing. A humble pebble coated in the most lustrous sheen. I take it back, this thing is far more precious than your life.
You're absolutely clear about the consequences of doing this? Blasphemy against Qlipoth's body . You think the IPC will let you get off scot-free?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Diamond has always been all about results. As long as I can create value far beyond the cost, the ends justify the means.

speaker: Aventurine
line: How else would The Family be fooled if there was no price to pay? It doesn't matter — even smashed to smithereens, the Preservation's cornerstone can still be used. Its effect may be greatly diminished, but... it's enough for me.
Now I'm really curious. Why does every step you take involve reckless risks, and the choices you prepare for yourself always come with a strong impulse for self-destruction?
Do you truly believe that the greater the risk, the greater the rewards? I wouldn't have guessed you'd be so loyal to the IPC.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Hmph, there is so much you don't see... Which is also why you'll never see how I'll win it all.
That is, if you can do what it takes.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...We'll just have to wait and see then.

title: Step Description
content: You are c█m█lete██ ██tranc█d by t█e █vgin boy.██ust who ███he? There█s sti█l tim███Mayb█ you ███ catch up ██ h██ and as█ █im exactly wha█ █████████.

speaker: Aventurine
line: The cornerstone is gone... Another illusion of the Harmony.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Huh?

speaker: Young Child
line: Hello, we meet again, Mr. Pretty-eyes.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Yes, we meet again. Did you find your mother and father?

speaker: Young Child
line: Of course, Big Sis is there too. The four of us were just playing hide-and-seek.

speaker: Young Child
line: I'm so happy! On our way here, Papa even brought me to see a flim .

speaker: Aventurine
line: I think you mean "film."

speaker: Young Child
line: Yes, that's it. Putting many drawings together and turning them into a moving wall painting.

speaker: Young Child
line: They put me, Papa, Mama and Big Sis together, turning us into one big family.

speaker: Young Child
line: You should give it a try too, Mister! You look sad. The amusement park will cheer you up.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Sure.

title: Step Description
content: Your wounds will never healYour █ound█ will never healYour █ound█ will n██er healYo██ █ound█ will n██er healYo██ █ound█ w███ n██er ████

speaker: Young Child
line: Go give it a try, Mister!

children.text:
(OpenClockie's Extras: Hamster Ball Knight: Fast & Furynuts Tutorial)
(OpenClockie's Extras: Movie Mode Tutorial)

speaker: Aventurine
line: How's that? Not a bad score, eh?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Boring.

title: Step Description
content: You are c█m█lete██ ██tranc█d by t█e █vgin boy.██ust who ███he? There█s sti█l tim███Mayb█ you ███ catch up ██ h██ and as█ █im exactly wha█ █████████.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Why aren't you talking?
You've piqued my interest... I'll admit that there are still aspects of you that I don't completely understand.

speaker: Aventurine
line: You sound sincere this time, at least.
Sincerity is one of my traits that everybody likes. And I have precious few of those. Moving on! See that maze over there? I'll know everything about you before you reach the exit.
Our quaint journey through this amusement park still isn't over... and I wouldn't mind stretching this out at all.

speaker: Young Child
line: Woah, this place... it's so tall. Even taller than the tallest rocks in the desert...

title: Step Description
content: You cannot escape from the pastYou ██nnot escape from the pa██You ██nnot ███ape from the pa██You ██nnot ███ape from ███ pa██You ██nn█t ███ape from ███ pa██You █████t ███ape f██m ███ pa██You █████t █████ f██m ███ pa████u █████t █████ f██m ███ pa██

speaker: Young Child
line: And there are so many flowers here. Big Sis, this one's for you!

text: Here is no water, only the rock
Rock and no water, only the sandy road

speaker: Aventurine
line: A dead end... Is this the wrong way?

text: Media:Trailblaze Mission Heaven is a Place on Earth.mp4

line: What's on your mind?

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's got nothing to do with you.
Do you need a hint? These are manacles on you. That man gave you your first job, and you made your first pot of gold... I remember it all too well.
You wrapped that iron chain around your fist, for that is the only tool you could find. Then, in that maze, you...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Shut up.
Oh... You don't wish to face your past? Unwilling to admit that your life is worth only sixty Tanbas ?
From what I see, you refuse to confront it, because it only proves your weakness.

speaker: Aventurine
line: How could a weak person take such daring risks?
That's right. You love the thrill of danger... but you refuse to let go of meaningless sentiments. Even in this beautiful dream, the only thing you "dare" allow yourself is death .

In your hands, those who follow you could've become joker cards. They're far more useful that way. It's not like this is the only place The Family ever cut corners. You could've had tons of action if you weren't so all-or-nothing. All it takes is a meager sacrifice... I bet "Opal" would have resolved this without a fuss.
A pity you're not him. You wouldn't be in this state if you could just get with the program.... And why couldn't you? Out of professional integrity?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Those techniques you mentioned are highly efficient, but it's not that I don't know about them — it's more like I couldn't care less. Get it?

speaker: Aventurine
line: What fun is it if the fight isn't fair?

Fair... Heh, you assume your opponents would fight fair in the first place. The odds are obviously not in your favor, so how are you just breezing by? Did that Masked Fool's words awaken something in you?

speaker: Aventurine
line: She gave me an answer that could turn everything upside down.
Hmph, everything?
You mean, it could make all the cards on the table just... disappear?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...That's cheating.

title: Step Description
content: Your future never existedYou█ future never existedYou█ future ne█er existedYou█ fut███ ne█er existedYou█ fut███ ne█er ████tedYou█ fut███ █e█er ████tedYo██ ██████ █e█er ████ted

speaker: Young Child
line: If these leaves could be brought back... Would they bloom into new flowers?

text: Were there water, we should stop and drink
Amongst the rock, one cannot stop or think
C██ck th█ l█st thi███ and m█m█ries

line: Your expression right now is hard to put into words. The lucky charm Mama left you is made from gold. Why did you never consider selling it?
You obviously could've lived a normal life like Big Sis that way. Looking back, that was the better choice.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Mama only left us with two pieces of jewelry: A necklace and a lucky charm. There won't ever be a third piece.
That's what you always say, but you actually regret it, don't you? That you didn't sell them?

speaker: Aventurine
line: You can zip it if there's nothing to talk about.

Ha... I know. You must remember what Big Sis told you: You're a child blessed by Gaiathra Triclops and can lead the clan to happiness. So, always remember to protect yourself and never resent the pain and poverty you're going through...
The words still ring in your ears, don't they? You're a good kid, so you definitely won't have forgotten.

So you surely won't forget how tragic her last moments of life were, how the piercing laughter behind you felt like it was drilling into your heart... You ran away without looking back, just as she told you to.
Tsk tsk... A lifelong regret, indeed.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Enough... Do you not have anything better to talk about?
Oh! Shut me down like a champ. Well I guess when it comes to mind games this isn't exactly your first rodeo.
I think I finally get you. And *whew* you are nuts.
"In the end, I'll ruin this beautiful dream and create the grandest death ." — You've stuck to that, start to finish.

Think about it. There's a Stellaron in play, the fabulous Robin loses her voice, two unsolved murders, cryptic messages from a Masked Fool , and a chance to go head-to-head with Sunday himself... and the only thing to pique your interest is one word — the last word, a word that's right there at your fingertips...
..."Death," but whose, exactly?

speaker: Aventurine
line: We'll know when the dice falls.
*laugh* Alright then, reserve a seat for me in the audience. I'm curious to see just how capable you are. Still, you never answered my question:
If you could start over... would you still want to be the child who received Gaiathra's blessing?

title: Step Description
content: Failure discarded selfish useless pointless coward murderer gambler blessed discarded loser chosen-one Mother Goddess's beloved crazy murderer blessed failure discarded loser pointless coward murderer chosen-one selfish ████ blessed discarded loser chosen-one ███ loser discarded pointle██ ██ward mur█████ gambler blessed █isc█████ useless loser ███sen-███ Mother Goddess██ ███████ loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser loser ████ ████ ███████████ ███ ██████ █████ █ ██ ████ █

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's so quiet this time. Is he finally gone...? Or am I the one about to disappear?

text: Dead mountain mouth, of carious teeth

title: Step Description
content: You are c█m█lete██ ██tranc█d by t█e █vgin boy.██ust who ███he? There█s sti█l tim███Mayb█ you ███ catch up ██ h██ and as█ █im exactly wha█ █████████.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Finally... made it out of this place.

speaker: Young Child
line: We're going home? But I don't want to go back yet...

speaker: Young Child
line: It's so fun here... I want to stay here forever...

text: But dry sterile thunder, without rain
But red sullen faces, sneer and snarl

speaker: Clockie
line: Brother Hanu! Where... are you going?

speaker: Boss Stone
line: There's only one place he can be going, whether it's in the past, present or future!

speaker: Origami Bird
line: Beautiful dream's about to end! The beautiful dream will never end!

text:
(Return to normal form)
(OpenHanu's Adventure: Part VII Tutorial)

speaker: Young Child
line: Mister... Is that you? I hear the sound of leather shoes.

speaker: Young Child
line: Ah... It really is you.

speaker: Young Child
line: I don't know why, Mister, but you always give me a special feeling... that makes me more curious about you.

speaker: Young Child
line: It's sad that I can't get to know you more. We have to say goodbye. Did you have fun?

speaker: Aventurine
line: You're... going back?

speaker: Young Child
line: Yes, I should go home. The day's getting dark, and it's going to rain. I don't want to worry the others.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Your home... Where is it?

speaker: Young Child
line: What a strange question. It's where Papa, Mama and Big Sis are...

speaker: Young Child
line: ...In this dream.

speaker: Young Child
line: This amusement park, this beautiful dream, they really are peaceful. Everyone loves it.

speaker: Young Child
line: But Mister, why don't you like it?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Because they're not here.
Where are they then?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I don't know.
You DO know. But there's no point pressing the issue.
Admit it. You're tired.
We all are, which is why we chose to stay here. Me... and him.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Your past... and future.

speaker: Aventurine
line: How long will you stay?

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Forever. We'll be with you, forever in this dream.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: ...This is the greatest honor that we can offer to those who hurtle towards death.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: The road less traveled is less traveled for a reason. But you've never gone in any other direction. Your own life is the chip you're most eager to lay down. Always has been.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: You don't care who the real murderer is. And the Watchmaker 's so-called "legacy" couldn't be more boring. What you want, what you need, is to be the smooth operator — the solid gold deal-maker who doesn't waste a drop of sweat even when he's up to his neck in danger, deep inside Family territory. You want to be polished up, cuffed with red-hot chains and spotlit center stage...

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: You'll be the closing act! The final sacrifice.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...I can do it, and it will be flawless.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Of course you can. Your luck will help you at the right time — a Stellaron and an Emanator ... It's that simple, no?

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: That way, the IPC will earn a place at the table. And as for you, you'll just happen to slip the leash, leave the rat race, extract yourself from this endless debacle. You'll have the freedom you've always dreamed of.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: This isn't the first time... you've been an escape artist from day one. This fiasco started with a "Death," and its curtains will fall on another "Death."

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: ...So, that's why Diamond chose you?

speaker: Aventurine
line: He's just after Penacony, no matter the means, no matter the price... It's not personal.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: It's hard, isn't it?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Don't get soft on me now. What, did you suddenly grow a conscience?

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Hey, I was born from your self. I'm well aware that climbing out of the hole you've dug is basically impossible.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: I can't stop you from doing what you want, and... we can't change where you want to go.

speaker: Aventurine
line: What's done can't be undone. All we can do is play the cards we're dealt, and rake in as much time as possible.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Yes. Alas, people won't make all the right choices in their lifetime... Though luck always seems like it's on your side.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: You will keep winning, having never lost before. But why you? Why... must it be you?

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: If all your luck is built on the pain of someone you love, on the loss of dozens more — if these windfalls, these jackpots aren't a gift from Gaiathra — if all they are is a long string of meaningless deaths...

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: ...Then what did we do to deserve living in a world like that?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Maybe... maybe when I get to where I'm going and look back, I'll know what the trip was all about.

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Hmph... Fine. Time to make a move, my friend. I'll be waiting up ahead .

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: Say goodbye to the kid before you shuffle off. It's...

speaker: "Aventurine"
line: It's best to die without regrets.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: And now... only we are left.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Can you take a photo for me? I want a memento.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Sure, come on.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Can you take a photo for me? I want a memento.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: How nice! Now I can see what I look like too.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Look at the lens when you're taking a photo the next time — your expression will look more natural.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Sure, I will. Then... Mister, are you going back too?

speaker: Aventurine
line: I can't leave yet.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I still have... a show to do.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Oh... You're about to go on stage, aren't you?

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Let's go then. I'll take you to the stage.

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Sure.

text: Get onstage. Fear not. Never look back

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: So you're an actor... No wonder your clothes are so stylish.

speaker: Aventurine
line: I'm actually a... merchant. But I do have a show to do.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Are you the same as those men in black in the sky? But you're not wearing black.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Only ordinary employees have to wear that. My position... is much higher than theirs.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Awesome, I hope I can become as good-looking as you when I grow up.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Of course you can.

speaker: Aventurine
line: You'll be better, and stronger than me.

text: There's another one who is beside you
But who is that on the other side of you?

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Behind this curtain is the grand stage...

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: It's almost time to go on stage. Are you ready? Good luck with your show.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Thank you.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: You still seem pretty nervous...

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Let's put our palms together. If you receive Gaiathra's blessing, you'll feel more relaxed.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: Putting our palms together is a simple ritual. By putting our palms together and reciting the prayer to Mama Fenge, SHE will bless us.

speaker: "Kakavasha"
line: If you are not familiar, I can guide you.

speaker: Aventurine
line: It's alright. I know how to do it.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Of course I know.

text: Media:Trailblaze Mission All the Sad Tales 2.mp4

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: This is where we go our own way, Kakavasha. The Katicans are coming.

speaker: Kakavasha
line: Why? The Katicans have already taken all our money, food, and they killed our parents... What more do they want?

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: Katicans are bloodthirsty, cruel, and insatiably greedy. They want everything, only to end up with nothing.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: This is a trick, an act of revenge. Remember? Today is the day of the Kakava, and also your birthday.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: They know the Avgin will surely hold a festival today. With the aid of this rain, they will come to destroy our wagons and take everything they want.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: Little do the Katicans know, this time we will fight back! The men in black that descend from the skies are on our side. The Katicans stand no chance against them and will surely pay for their arrogance.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: Without this rain, the Katicans would never take action, and we would not have the chance to turn the tide. This is a gift from Gaiathra, and you are Kakavasha , whose good fortune will bless your sister with success.

speaker: Kakavasha
line: But... but people will die, and you will be in danger... How is that good fortune? Why are you all doing this...

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: The Avgin always return their blood debts. Gaiathra calls for me, while Papa and Mama are waiting for me. I must answer the call. But SHE will bless you with good fortune and help you survive.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: As long as you are alive, the blood of the Avgin will never run dry. So run, Kakavasha, do not be afraid, and do not look back. Go to the other side of the mountain. The rain will accompany you, and the rain will bless you.

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: As for us, we will reunite in Kakava 's next aurora.

text: Media:Trailblaze Mission All the Sad Tales 3.mp4

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: "May the goddess Gaiathra close HER eyes three times..."

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: "Keep your blood eternally pulsing..."

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: "Let your journey be forever peaceful... "

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: "...and your schemes forever concealed."

speaker: Kakavasha's Sister
line: Farewell, Kakavasha.

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "Newsflash from the Interastral Peace Broadcast: The IPC Marketing Development Department's spokesperson confirms that a small-scale rebellion has broken out in the unclaimed region of Sigonia. The situation is now under control..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "The insurgents are from a local clan known as Katica, which has a long history of disdain towards the IPC. This has caused a serious negative impact to the work of the IPC's Marketing Development Department..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "The clan launched a massive attack on the Avgin, who were under the protection of the IPC, resulting in 6,728 deaths and 3,452 missing. The casualties are currently under the care of the Frontline Trauma Team..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "The spokesperson expresses his deepest condolences for this devastating humanitarian disaster, at the same time delivering an important message on this matter to all interplanetary citizens..."

speaker: Interastral Peace Broadcast
line: "Finally, he proclaims: 'The hammer of Preservation will fall for all beings, regardless of life or death, regardless of race, regardless of ideology, to uphold the basic rights we inherently possess.'"

speaker: Aventurine
line: Kakavasha?

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Bye.

speaker: Aventurine
line: Okay, all the actors are in place. It's time for the show to begin.

speaker: Aventurine
line: This act is dedicated to you. I hope it'll be an unforgettable memory for you...

speaker: Aventurine
line: ...Kakavasha.

speaker: Sunday
line: By the way, before you go, I have a personal question.

speaker: Sunday
line: You... do you truly want to destroy the world with your own hands?

speaker: Aventurine
line: Let's assume — just assuming, now — that every time I roll the dice, there is a possibility of achieving this particular outcome...

speaker: Aventurine
line: Then, I would be quite happy to make that wager.

text: When you have a chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret.
